wikipedia_page.main: Nigel Saddington (9 December 1965 – 24 January 2019) was an English professional footballer who played as a defender in the Football League for Doncaster Rovers, Sunderland and Carlisle United and in non-League football for Gateshead.

response: * 24 January 2019: Nigel Saddington, 53, Doncaster Rovers, Sunderland and Carlisle United defender.
